FRENCH: Gardien de la Terre du Milieu

ENGLISH: This character is part of and working to aid the free peoples of Middle-Earth.
FRENCH: Ce personnage fait tout son possible pour aider les Peuples Libres de la Terre du Milieu.

ENGLISH: This character has been corrupted by the darkness of Morgoth.
FRENCH: Ce personnage a été corrompu par les mensonges de Sauron.

ENGLISH: This character left Middle-Earth and sailed to Valinor, the realm of the Valar in Aman, also known as the Undying Lands.
FRENCH: Ce personnage a quitté la Terre du Milieu pour rejoindre Valinor, le royaume des Valar en Aman, connu également sous le nom de Terres Immortelles.

ENGLISH: This character resides in Valinor, the realm of the Valar in Aman.
This character is crossing Helcaraxë, the Grinding Ice, on the way to Middle-Earth.
This character is visiting Gundabad, the awakening place of Durin.
This character is visiting Khazad-Dum, the great Halls of Durin.
This character is visiting Helcarth, the land of awakening, in search of the waters of Cuiviénen.
This character seeks riches in the dwarf realms east of the Blue Mountains.
